  • Method Details

    • setUp

      @BeforeEach public void setUp()

    • cleanUp

      @AfterEach public void cleanUp()

    • testFloorConstructor

      @Test @DisplayName("testing the Floor constructor") public void testFloorConstructor()
      Testing the Floor constructor. It checks if the floor object is not null and the floor number is initialized correctly.

    • testReadMessagesForThisFloorFromFile

      @Test @DisplayName("test reading messages from file for a floor") public void testReadMessagesForThisFloorFromFile()
      Reads the input file, converts all lines into messages, checks if the starting floor number == this floor number, and adds them to the messagesReadFromFile list. Sorts the messages to send by time.

    • testReadFromFileMultipleFloors

      @Test @DisplayName("Test read from file multiple floors") public void testReadFromFileMultipleFloors()
      This method is used to test the functionality of reading messages from a file for multiple floors. It initializes multiple Floor objects with different floor numbers and reads messages for each floor from a file specified by FILE_PATH constant. It asserts the number of messages read for each floor.

    • testLowestTimeInFile

      @Test public void testLowestTimeInFile()
      Finds the lowest time in the input file.
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - If the file is not found or if there is an input/output error.

    • testScheduleToSend

      @Test @DisplayName("assert that the schedule of jobs exists and is populated") public void testScheduleToSend()
      Asserts that the schedule of jobs exists and is populated.

    • testDetermineFirstInterval

      @Test @DisplayName("assert FirstInterval() method returns a numeric value.") public void testDetermineFirstInterval()
      Determines the first interval between two messages.
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - If there is an error in determining the first interval.

    • testWaiting

      @Test @DisplayName("assert wait() method works as it should.") public void testWaiting()
      Method for testing the waiting method in Floor. It asserts that the wait() method works as it should by measuring the elapsed time after calling wait() and asserting that it is greater than or equal to the given wait time.
